Chimera.name: Eldritch Slam
Chimera.text: While the Tigers head holds you down, the Rams head pummels you mercilessly

Drider.name: Onslaught
Drider.text: A casted fireball, A sword to the chest, and the puncturing wounds of spider legs, all instantaneously.

Invisible Stalker.name: Ghostly Ambush
Invisible Stalker.text: You don't know what it was, but you do know it is your blood.

Mammoth.name: Crush
Mammoth.text: Never fight under a mammoth. Moreso under a mammoth's foot.

Vrock.name: Demonic Claw
Vrock.text: The Vrock swoops, its claws peel through flesh as if it was water.

Wyvern.name: Fire Twister
Wyvern.text: The Wyvern launches a fireball, swiftly splitting it in two and with a burst from its wings launches you in two whirling firestorms.

Oni.name: Glaive
Oni.text: The Oni transforms an arm into a massive glaive, sweeping it across your neck.

Shield Guardian.name: Indestructible
Shield Guardian.text: The Warforged monster reaches for your arm while accidentally snapping your leg.

Stone Giant.name: Trebuchet
Stone Giant.text: Seemingly from across the world, A boulder is thrown with exact precision, obliterating your body.

Chain Devil.name: Binding
Chain Devil.text: You feel snakelike chains begin to swarm your body, unable to fend them off before you are crushed.

Cloaker.name: Phantasms
Cloaker.text: Three Cloakers appear before you, unable to track the real Cloaker, you quickly succumb to its wretched psychic howels.

Frost Giant.name: Frozen Slam
Frost Giant.text: The Frost Giant picks you up and slams you onto the ground. It wasn't hard.

Hezrou.name: Stench
Hezrou.text: The odor of death permeates from this creature; so unbearable you are unable to keep your countenance.

Spirit Naga.name: Venomous Spray
Spirit Naga.text: The Naga takes a bite of your leg, as the creature releases you see the not even the massive wound could contain this amount of venom.
